text: Lawrence Henry Summers (born November 30, 1954) is an American economist and politician. He was the 71st United States Secretary of the Treasury from 1999 to 2001. He also was the director of the National Economic Council from 2009 to 2010. Summers was the president of Harvard University from 2001 to 2006."Historical Facts", Harvard University, retrieved March 31, 2017 In November 2023, Summers joined the board of directors of artificial general intelligence company OpenAI. ==References== ==Other websites== * Faculty page at the John F. title: Lawrence Summers
